website_summaries.verdict: These beautiful square jars were built with convenience and freshness in mind.
pros: The tightly sealed lids are secure and reliable, keeping your spices fresh
The rubber corners conveniently pop open for pour or sprinkle options
The small see-through top is big enough to see when you're running low and small enough not to let too much light in (which will keep your spices fresher longer)
Durable magnets easily hold full jars with no down sliding
Each jar holds a typical sized bottle amount of spice
The square design is modern and aesthetically pleasing
cons: Jars stick out farther than most
May be better suited for the side of the fridge rather than the front

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. So happy to have my spices off the shelf, and up on the door where I can see them ALL (and they're even organized alphabetically). One tip, if you're putting labels on, turn the container so the 'sprinkle' lid is in the upper right hand corner. This will keep very fine spices (baking soda, for example) from leaking out when on the steel base. Unfortunately, I discovered this after the fact - I just had to turn the culprits over, so the label now reads upside down, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Oven hood spices
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these on the fridge, felt like they were too deep. An inch deep, 2" wide would be great. Was going to return, then hubby put a few on the oven hood. Perfect place for all 12! Looks good, and they shouldn't leak. Great space saver for tiny living. **Update** Nothing like Thanksgiving to test the kitchen. While doing some serious stovetop and oven cooking today, I realized the spice containers on the oven hood were getting really warm. I haven't filled them yet, so no spice damage. We moved them back to the fridge for now. May purchase a magnetic plate to wall mount somewhere, or just leave them on the fridge....
customer_reviews.author: Kaygee

customer_reviews.title: They LEAK!
customer_reviews.text: They leak!! A few even arrived crushed. I transferred ALL of my spices to these containers to use on a magnetic board on my cupboard door. Every time I'd open the door, I'd get a light coating of cumin, smoked paprika, and ground mustard. It made a tremendous mess and I'm sure would have made my spices go stale very quickly. I ended up buying all new spices to start over with which was very expensive and very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the most disgusting fashion. One of the two box of six contained jars that were obviously a returned item with significant degradation on the clear plastic. There was also a note from the previous buyer within the box. From the jars in the first boxes that looked brand new, the lids showed varying degree of tolerance. The jars were hard to wash and dry with all the crevasses from the way the metal containers were manufactured. Not recommend buying from "River Colony Trading"
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great spice option!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a year ago and have loved them. A while standard sized spice container fits in one and they are super magnetic! I did open one tonight and the rubbery part inside has kind of melted to the metal and got stuck.. but I don't mind, its not a spice I use often! However, I did just buy them again recently to add more and I've noticed the strength of the magnet is much weaker than the old ones. They totally still work and the magnet on the older ones is seriously so strong! But I'm wondering why these ones feel less magnetic... love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Wa

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seal is not air tight, ground spices cake up quickly. The plastic lid melted where it touched ground clove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spice It Up in Style
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!! We searched for a long time for spice jars that would hold a nice amount of spices. These are perfect! With a pour or sprinkle option, window to see the spice level, strong magnet, space saving square shape! We planed to just put our "popular" spices in them- for taking in the RV... but we love them so much we are buying another set so we can have all our spices organized!!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Sticks well even full, and have had no problems using them in the month I have had them. Takes a lot of shaking for course ground, but fine ground comes out easy on shaker side. Have to use pour side for larger dried herb mixes. Tops are easy to pull open, but secure when using or storing. I went back and purchased a second set I liked them do much I am switching most spices over to them. Holds almost 3 ounces average powdered spice. I put a round sticker over the top to block out the light and wrote a label on it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W.

customer_reviews.title: Want to love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive containers that hold a ton! As in other reviews, they do not seam to seal completely and a light dusting of spices come out when closed. As these will be hanging on my fridge and not moving, the only real issues I worry about is them becoming stale more quickly or absorbing moisture from being in close proximity to the stove. I'm going to keep them for now, but it's on my list to upgrade in the future. I will update this review as usage continues.
customer_reviews.author: User1209

customer_reviews.title: I really like these! I just moved into a new place ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! I just moved into a new place with a much smaller kitchen and limited cabinets. These are a great space saver. I will buy more eventually. The reason for 3 stars is that 2 arrived broken. The magnets on the bottom detached. They were easy to glue back on though. I also find the lids a bit filmsy. On other side of the lid there are caps. One for pouring, one for sprinkling. They dont open all the way up without being held back and the hinges are thin. I dont use them. I just take the lids off and scope out with my measuring spoons. I havent had any problems with spills or leaking though!
customer_reviews.author: Marleny

customer_reviews.title: There's only one thing not to love about these -
customer_reviews.text: I adore these spice jars! They are larger than the jars I had previously been using and it's nice to get them out of the way and off the counter thanks to a mounted metal sheet. The only bummer about them is that if they are too full, they will leak. The two corners where they pour from don't have complete seals and due to that, I will occasionally find a little mess on the counter - usually caused by the removal, use, and replacement of neighboring jars. Just something to be aware of - but if the jars aren't full, there isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: R Mason

customer_reviews.title: They leak ground spices like a sieve...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but poor implementation. I'd give it more stars, but not only are the lids not airtight (which is fine), finely ground spices pour out of the sides of the lid even when the lid is sealed tight. Unfortunately, we were in the process of moving into a smaller place when I ordered these, so now that we are unpacking them and find they are faulty, it is too late to return them. Boo. If you are only going to use them for larger spices or something non-powdery -- and not finely ground spices -- they may work for you. But I would definitely stay away if planning to use for all your spices.
customer_reviews.author: TheBootfitter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Organizational Qualities
customer_reviews.text: These little shakers are great! A few of them were damaged upon arrival, but 22/24 were still usable! They stick well and don't slide. You can write on them with an Expo marker to keep track of what you've stored in them.
customer_reviews.author: coraebeth

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot but the price held me off for well over a year before purchasing. Yes, they do help organize my pantry and they look nice but... you still have to buy a metal sheet to attach them to to put in pantry if you don't want them visible on your fridge or stove. I would buy again but like I said, they're pricey, so I'll probably wait another year or more before purchasing another set.....
customer_reviews.author: Herbal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The only thing I didn’t like was the onion powder seemed to be coming out of one of them (and yes, I made sure it was snapped closed on all 4 corners). But great addition to my kitchen and helps to keep the spices out of the cabinets and off the countertops. Very please with this purchase. (The labels were purchased from a different seller)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goodheart

customer_reviews.title: Rust. Ughhhhh.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is fairly strong. However... I washed them in warm, soapy water when I got them and put them upside down to air dry. Most of them ended up with rusty spots all in them where the bottom joins the sides and at the top where there is a small lip. Find a better brand with better quality materials rather than wasting money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Elwfaith

customer_reviews.title: Reduced the clutter in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen and LOVE to cook. Before these containers, I had an overflowing spice rack on my countertop, looking cluttered. I purchased these containers and magnets, that have a sticky side. I decided to write, with a sharpie, what each container has inside, so I could rotate in different spices, based on what I’m liking at the time. Sharpie washes off, So I don’t have to mess with labels. My counter top looks much much better, making my kitchen less cluttered
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Super love these
customer_reviews.text: Super love these. We just bought a house with a small kitchen with limited cabinets (I know, dumb). So, I need all the help I can get. These look great on the fridge. Each one holds an entire McCormick spice container. If you have some that end up full and kinda heavy, the magnet might not hold the weight. So, I put those above the others to help hold it up. I did have one of the corners pop open when I was moving them around - but, that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Babs C.

customer_reviews.title: Pour & sprinkle lids break!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, little taller than expected (didn’t read/look for the measurements beforehand), strong magnet! But 1st time opening the lid on the corner to sprinkle spice, lid broke on 1 side The lid still closed but I’m pretty sure it’s going to snap off entirely after a handful of uses & after a handful more I betcha I’ll lose the lid :(. If u don’t need to sprinkle or pour & don’t mind explosion of spices when opening the main lid - these will be great for u.
customer_reviews.author: "burrowm"

customer_reviews.title: The all-metal tins are much better.
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy for me, and the magnets weren't as strong as other magnetic spice jars I've tried. I just had a gut feeling that this product would end in tears and spice all over the floor. Also, the little plastic flaps just aren't ergonomically convenient. The one with little holes doesn't have enough holes to get the proper amount of spice on the food; the one with the large hole for pouring would work well only if you're pouring into a measuring spoon, which I never do. Opening the whole top to get a measuring spoon inside is not convenient either. The all-metal tins are much better.
customer_reviews.author: mga827

customer_reviews.title: Using them for tea bags.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these to hold tea bags. I have quite a stash of teas. I was hoping they would be a bit bigger. They measure 2"x2" on the outside and roughly 2.25" high. But they'll work well enough. They hold about a half box of Celestial Seasonings tea. I'm happy to have more room in my cabinet now. Magnets are strong.
customer_reviews.author: momma 2 four

customer_reviews.title: Look good but don’t work if filled over half way
customer_reviews.text: They look great but they don’t hold if you fill up more than half way full. I have to put separate magnets underneath them so they don’t fall off. Really bummed. But the container itself works great. I love big the sprinkle and pour options. Also wish they came with labels. I had to order some and they were too big. It’s hard to find labels that small.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McDonald

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never rate anything, and I would give these 0 stars if I could. Dried out (as in, hard as a rock) $50 worth of spices. Complete waste of money, and it happened after my return deadline passed, of course. DO NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: What happened!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product almost two years ago. They were excellent! Well just bought this new set and what crap! I’m actually angry! The magnets are not as strong as the previously bought set. Opened the box, only 1 sticks to the refrigerator, the other five slide down. They must use cheaper magnets now! It’s really really disappointing. I feel I’ve just wasted $21 and change for nothing! And I’m not going to pay to return them.
customer_reviews.author: joe318

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I know this product did not cost that much, but the way it was shipped (in a big yellow envelope with bubble wrap) put little dents in most of the tins. The plastic around the tins was open and the tins were moving around in the envelope. Once the tins are on the fridge you can put them close together and not see most of the dent's. For what I need not worth sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but a little messy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They look so classy, the herbs and spices look so great through the little windows and I love that they have flat sides and can fit closely to each other. I bought 3! The only gripe I have echoes that of others, that finely ground spices seem to leak out at the seems of the lid. I put the label on the side so that you can see through the little window and have it so that the our opening is at the top. Many herbs need to be poured out, as the little tiny shaker holes are too small, but they work well for the spices.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine &.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy or spill all your seasonings!
customer_reviews.text: Lids do not snap on tight enough! Magnet strong, but when you pull from front, lid easily falls off and you lose all your expensive herbs and seasonings all over the floor, losing tons of money and cleaning up big messes. Wish I had never bought! Need tighter lid! Or screw on.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my RV...where to put spices out of the way and to keep them from flying all over when traveling? In these! They are roomy, easy to get the lid off to fill and there is a pour spout and sprinkle holes on each side. I just ordered more for toothpicks and a few more condiments. I have these lined up on the hood above the range and they stick on very strong.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic force is very weak. Opening for limited dispensing was useless as most spices are not a fine powder, the opening holes are too small except for fine white pepper. No labels. Viewing window isn’t practical as I can’t tell difference between parsley and oregano. Overall, don’t waste your money! It’s cheap and has limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Baker

customer_reviews.title: Spice up cooking with these
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be exactly what I need-.hold what was in typical jars of spices There is no leaking, I watched the video and agree that if closed well there is no leaking. Hold well on the side of my refrig. Now the days of three jars of the same spice are gone!, You will be happy with these.It is a joy to grab the spice I need without hunting. Only con is I need to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, and well made
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews before I made my purchase and I ended up getting two sets. I have not been disappointed. I did read that for some spices the small holes didn't work and would clog. It really hasn't been an issue for me. If something does clog, I just open the other side and shake it out, really not an issue. I do love these little guys though. I have them on the side of my fridge and it is incredibly handy to just reach up and grab whatever you need. I may buy another set because I underestimated how many spices I had in my cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer9684

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These look AMAZING! They hold all/most of a regular size bottle of spices. ONLY complaint is they leak when they're on the open hole side, so I have to make sure the sift side is down when they're hanging on the fridge. Also, salt (bit heavier than other spices) sags a bit on the fridge, so I have to put it above another to help distribute the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money..
customer_reviews.text: Only tried three spices.. The salt caked up so bad that I just went back to the salt shaker. The pepper and garlic powder also caked, and clogged the shaker opening, but I can still pour out the other opening. Company also does not accept returns (that should have been a red flag for me). Would have been better off buying a regular spice rack. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: We are totally thrilled with this creative solution for storage if our herbs and spices. We cleared a cluttered cabinet, made the spices more accessible and covered an unfinished dude if the microwave all at once. A minor product flaw (2 loose lids out of 24) was quickly replaced by the vendor with a few extras. Top notch service!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Osann

customer_reviews.title: Nice but some quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: Great size and looks perfect. We may have gotten a returned box... but one had the magnet fall out once we stuck it on the wall. So it appears it wasn’t glued properly. We filled another one and the magnet wouldn’t hold the salt filled container. We put the salt in another one and it held fine. We bought the 6 pack really only needing 4 and we only got 4 useable, the other two were garbage. Poor quality but good looking product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Whitney

customer_reviews.title: A really good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They open easily, are a good size, and hold well to my fridge. I live in a small apartment, so they're a real space saver. I don't use a lot of super-finely ground spices, so I don't know about the leakage problem other reviews have mentioned, but for things like curry powder they've been fine. I've tried other brands and these are the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: magicD

customer_reviews.title: Love the size, multiple openings
customer_reviews.text: I previously had round magnetic spice containers that were awkward for my new spice drawer and got sticky and hard to open, depending on the spice. These containers are wonderful. Perfectly sized for my spice drawer, I was able to fit more containers in the same space. I love the dual openings and they have yet to stick. LOVE these -
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Penhall Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient magnetic spice/seasoning holders
customer_reviews.text: These cling surprisingly well to my fridge and hold more than I expected. The tops come off easily so you can scoop out the contents, but won’t fall off while attached to a metal surface. (Labels not included unfortunately.)
customer_reviews.author: StarHusky

customer_reviews.title: Really like these, have had them for about 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these, have had them for about 3 months and have them attached to my fridge next to the stove for easy access. I did have a couple of the spices clump up inside, so I think there may be some moisture getting in thorugh the seals though the spices are easy enough to break apart with a little shaking. There are only 3 holes for the "sprinkle" side, so depending on what is in the container, you may not be able to effectively season without using the other side with the bigger opening. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeWildcat

customer_reviews.title: Love these shakers
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review from negative to positive. I somehow overlooked that these do have a shake and a pour function almost hidden at opposite corners. Completely changes the functionality in my view.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spice jars!
customer_reviews.text: I initially got the 6 pack jars. I loved these cute jars so much that I got a pack of 12 to store all my spice and to fill my drawer beautifully.These have a little bit of that tin can feel but are relatively more sturdy.I like the options of being able to sprinkle or enable more free flow.Perfect for the combination of whole spices and powdered spices.The rim of the one of the lids seemed to come out when pulled a little harder,but that didn't bother me much.Overally cute product!
customer_reviews.author: Prem Kumar Madasu

customer_reviews.title: Organization is KEY!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my kitchen, although one of them slipped out my hands and went everywhere. I am a bit clumsy so my bad! However it’s perfect for the organization which is what I was truly trying to achieve I just have to watch out how I hold things. So it lost a star for sturdiness, would be nice if it would stay closed if it falls. I mean I have kids that I’m hoping one day will start making dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Vickyliz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for loose leaf tea, too!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for small tins to keep my favorite loose leaf teas in, and these are perfect for me. Instead of fumbling in the cabinets in the morning, they're right at my fingertips. I love that I don't have to remove the entire lid; I just flip open one of the small dispensers on the corner and I can control the amount of tea going into my tea infuser. Love them, and recommend to all of the clumsy just-out-of-bed tea drinkers.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny V.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but only with a work-around.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this product. It is great for saving space. My disappointment was in the weakness of the magnet. Barely sticks to my fridge (even though other brands do). I found that they adhere nicely to a magnetic knife holder which I mounted to the wall. More costly this way, but ended up working out well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: They leak everywhere, so many of them didn’t even close properly. Made huge mess all the time, especially when putting on the refrigerator...the force would make the surrounding containers jolt and puff out seasoning on each other.
customer_reviews.author: truthis

customer_reviews.title: Not a great seal
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and have been wanting them for a while. Finally pulled the trigger but was disappointed to see that once on my fridge, powders fall out of the sprinkle corner. The corners don’t seal properly so any kind of powder falls through a little bit while hanging on the fridge
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these spice containers
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect spice containers. I purchased 2 sets, we lined the back of the spice cupboard so the magnets on the bottom of these containers would stick and now when I open the cupboard, all my spices are alphabetized, easy to see and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn R. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Magnet was pretty weak, but not sure to blame my fridge ...
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but every single container leaked when lightly shaken to check the seal. Magnet was pretty weak, but not sure to blame my fridge or the jars. If the seal was airtight I would still use them, but these just ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: These leak and don't seal at all.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these when I got them and set them all up, but they immediately started to leak and some won't even close. I bought two packs of these at the end of January and I am not looking for something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice containers.
customer_reviews.text: This would be 5 stars but, One of the containers had a small dent but kept it since it was so close to Christmas and I had bought as gift. Once it's put in the center of the other containers it's not noticeable. The recipient loves them! She has a small kitchen and they're so convenient on the side of her fridge. They might also get a chance to hold her children's artwork. 😊 She wants to add more to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Spices mildew in humid climates
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Fit nicely in my drawer with the label on the lids so I could see them all at once. Until my spices started molding in them—-something I’ve never had happen. I thought it was a fluke until it continued-multiple spice types. I live in the south so it is humid here. Maybe these would be ok out west where the climate is dry. But it’s a no go here. Shame because I loved them
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself. I wouldn't recommend putting them right next to the stove or oven as the heat/humidity makes the spices stick together and lose flavor. That being said I purchased a metal back splash and hung them above my counter top and they work much better.
customer_reviews.author: SEE III

customer_reviews.title: Crappy closures and poorly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice in the picture and in person, except that the lids are cheap Chinese garbage that don't stay on or closed, Poorly made. I received a replacement order that was just tossed in a plastic bag... the replacements arrived damaged. If there were an option for negative stars, then I would definitely smash that button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No seal- big mess
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use these as they have the plastic tops which won't rust like the solid metal ones and offered the sift and pour options. Unfortunately, the tops don't stay on and as soon as you put them on the wall, the spices start pouring out. There is no seal to hold them in. Very unfortunate but I would not recommend this item unless you are looking for a huge clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my stove hood & I love them! No more taking up counter/cabinet space, they are easy to see & with in reach, but still out the way.
customer_reviews.author: Beedledee

customer_reviews.title: Love these spice jars
customer_reviews.text: Love these spice jars! They are real space saver, especially in our small kitchen. So far, we've bought three boxes (18 total) and plan on buying more. They are sturdy and the magnet is super strong. They are visually attractive and artistic and can be arranged in any manner. Our spices were previously stored in a messy cabinet, with the frustration of searching for the right spice. The magnetic spice jars helped with keeping our spices organized and allowed us extra cabinet space (and extra time now that we can easily find what we need). I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Little

customer_reviews.title: Even when full to the top, the magnets can ...
customer_reviews.text: Even when full to the top, the magnets can hold the weight with no problem and no condiment is "leaking" out at least form me, i do wish they came with something to put labels on so i can identify my spices properly
customer_reviews.author: iutaro girotto

customer_reviews.title: Leaky, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This leak spices everywhere! While they may be reasonably priced, it is because they are poor quality. Even with the lids tightly shut, I double checked several times, they did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Amoret

customer_reviews.title: No leak, no sliding but holds some moisture.
customer_reviews.text: I use the spice jars on my fridge in my small kitchen. They are not air tight which I suppose not many store bought spice containers are but I prefer glass. This worked great for my intention and saved space. No leaking while on the fridge. No sliding down the fridge due to wieght of the spice in the jar. Also, these are placed on the side of the fridge not the door to reduce the side of it were to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I received one that the lid does not close, but other then that satisfied. Stickers bought through another seller
customer_reviews.author: B.Landers

customer_reviews.title: Loose lids
customer_reviews.text: These have a great magnet on them and don't move when attached to my fridge but the lids are loose and powdered spices go everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I was able to make a little room in my cabinet by putting some spices and seasonings in these. They stay put on my fridge and are close at hand. Nothing has spilled out yet. Will definitely buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leigha W.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Space saver, which I LOVE! The small holes side are small. I rarely use that side. The open side let’s out a lot. I mainly ignore these flaws because having the space in my small kitchen is much more worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our RV
customer_reviews.text: We should have bought a bigger magnetic board, but are able to fit 8 on there. Make sure you take them down on move day! We had one fall off while traveling and the clear piece popped out and salt was everywhere 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Small openings but still functional and nice
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool and the magnetic quality helps with space limitations since you can put them on your fridge. The openings could be a little bigger for the contents to pour out, which is why I give 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: uncle jazz

customer_reviews.title: Purchased, but not sold.
customer_reviews.text: They have been working fine thus far. However, I am foreseeing a couple of the cheapo tabs to fall off soon. They stick to the fridge great and hold well. Garlic powder has seeped through one container; sea salt has almost broken / jammed another flap. Would I buy it again? Eh, probably not. Am I marginally pleased with the purchase, living in a super small kitchen...yes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Siddons

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any problems with spices coming out the side. I saw those reviews as well the ones which said to not have the wide side down in case it happens. I do have a stainless steel refrigerator.... but not all the way around. Certain sections don’t hold magnet as well so I just went vertical inside of horizontal with my spices! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SamE

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Functional, space saving and strong. I like the square aspect so the will all fit together. Easy to remove just 1. Wish it came with labels. I used a sharpie. Fits adequate amount. Best for firm spices rather than powdered.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Olick

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Ok if They will be sitting upright.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get my spice containers, however four of them did not stick to the refrigerator meaning that the magnets was not strong enough. Additionally the spices was coming out of the containers on the ones that were sticking to the fridge. This leads me to believe that the do not have a tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: BUT they are easy to open
customer_reviews.text: the magnets don't hold. They slide down the fridge when they are full. BUT they are easy to open, you can fit a measuring spoon in them and I like the labels and they stack nicely. So not a total loss but if you want them to stick on fridge then DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Malone

customer_reviews.title: Attractive with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Lids are not as secure as I'd like especially for being stored magnetically on a wall. Several times the lid doesn't want to snap closed and I find salt sprinkling out. Also, magnets could be stronger. Depending on spice, some I can only fill half way otherwise the jar slides down the wall
customer_reviews.author: LWDIY

customer_reviews.title: leaking lids
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 12 dispensers were unusable due to a defect in the plastic lids. The lids buckle and do not form a tight seal. Therefore they leak when shaken or when stored on a vertical surface, according to their design. I suspect it will just be a matter of using the dispensers a few times and the rest of the lids will buckle, as well. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marschke

customer_reviews.title: Great containers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little containers. It is true what others say about powders "leaking out", but with this type of closure, it is kind of expected and not a big deal since not much comes out anyways. We keep these on the fridge and I bought a white liquid chalk marker to label them. It works well if you can refrain from smudging them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: As other said, the jars are not air tight ...
customer_reviews.text: As other said, the jars are not air tight and eventually all of my spices caked up and had to be tossed. There was also a reaction happening between some of them and the metal of the containers. It resembled rust. I threw all of them out and I'll invest in jars with screw top lids.
customer_reviews.author: Janine D. Althouse

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Really love these containers which hold quite a bit. Excellent for RV’s and tiny kitchens
customer_reviews.author: Txblossom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I picked them over other designs because they have the side openings. Easy to use in the kitchen and I'm loving the organization!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far like this product a lot. In fact I just ordered a second set. I know some reviewers said the shake hole things aren't big enough but I don't mind b/c I usually use a measuring spoon anyway and the tops are easy to remove for measuring. One container holds one 1.5 oz McCormicks spice jar of spice. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: sticks easily
customer_reviews.text: they hold just about a store-bought jar's full of spice, they stay where I put them. I could have preferred them to come with pre-printed labels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, but not tightly sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast and packaged well. However, the magnet is not as strong as I hoped. I only filled less than half way and they slide down my fridge and leak.
customer_reviews.author: M Larios

customer_reviews.title: Keep your spices in site
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product where I could keep the spices I use regularly close at hand. This product is just what I wanted. Magnetic, so I can keep it handy on my refrigerator door. I didn't want to put it on my oven hood b/c I think it would get too warm. Plus they are easy to fill and there are corners on the lid that you can pop up to either pour or sprinkle the spice while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: MOSasha

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They work well, and make the different spices extremely accessible. Having them all in sight help me keep track of what spices I do have, so I am not always buying double.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping spices
customer_reviews.text: at this time I just kept them in the box. I filled with my favorite cooking spices and cook a great dinner. Not as big as I read in the reviews. One person said she put her tea bags? A stash tea bag would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: What a great product! They fit much better than the round ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! They fit much better than the round versions. I gave it four stars because they could use a stronger magnet. The reason being I filled one up with a heavier blend and it slid down my refrigerator. Cure, reduced the amount of that product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value+Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipper, items exactly as advertised, great price. AAA seller
customer_reviews.author: taxfree4

customer_reviews.title: very cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: They look so nice on my fridge and they gave me some much needed space in my cabinets. it has a pour opening and a sprinkle opening but no tags. I just used paper and tape adjusting them so you have to turn them to read the label.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice jars - not for cloves
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little magnetic storage jars. They arrived in great condition, packaged well, and I've had no problems with the lids closing, or the jars sliding down. The only issue I've had is that the plastic the lid is made from (potentially #6, from my research?) is not compatible with cloves. The cloves eat away at it, so I had to transfer them to a glass jar. Other than that, I've had no problems, and would definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: MaryC

customer_reviews.title: Neat, functional
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend; easy to fill and the lids are snug. Brightened up my spice drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin95

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to see, use, and access my spices
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these! They seem higher quality than the round ones I see everywhere and that I have used in the past. Magnets are strong, lids are easy to remove, and the pour options are great. You do have to remove the entire lid to use a measuring spoon, but I am okay with that (and more often just estimate anyways). I am not using them horizontally, though...
customer_reviews.author: Brett LaFlamme

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These spice jars look awesome on the side of my microwave. None of them have leaked. I use them for my most frequently used spices, and they make finding them much easier. I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Baldogo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute spice jars
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use in our RV while camping. They were perfect for the little space that we have and they look so cute hanging on the wall in the kitchen. They do leak somewhat but it's only with very fine powders like cinnamon for example.
customer_reviews.author: angela sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Handy and visible
customer_reviews.text: Slick way to have your high-use shakeables handy near the stove. Salt and pepper are obvious choices. But...one of mine is going to have chocolate sprinkles for putting on ice cream (instead of being in the cupboard out of sight and out of mind).
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: These work great and stick to my fridge well (almost too well ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great and stick to my fridge well (almost too well at times!). Only con is that when stuck on the fridge, such that the openings are perpendicular to the floor, the smaller openings tend to open just a little, which allows some of the smaller seasonings to sneak through and spill a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Labels not included
customer_reviews.text: These do not come with labels like other spice containers. Labels are another 6-10 dollars. Hindsight I would have ordered a set with labels.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: Very cool idea in theory, but the product itself isn't amazing
customer_reviews.text: They're ok. Very cool idea in theory, but the product itself isn't amazing. I do still have them on my fridge even-though some of the more finely ground spices leak through the caps on 2 of them. The magnet is nice and strong, the steel shape is also fine, the issue to me is the plastic cap. It is hard to keep completely closed,and even when it is, I still have some leaked spices (garlic powder) if the container is moved while leaning on its side.
customer_reviews.author: NateTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: NO LABELS
customer_reviews.text: 5 of 6 were dented! 2 big & 3 small> they do not appear to be from mailing.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Madsen

customer_reviews.title: wonderful space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love these, this is the second set I've bought probably will buy a third someday when I have more room!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Find better lids
customer_reviews.text: Opened both sides of the lid to see how it worked and one won’t close. The larger side snapped shut right away but the side with the portion control stays open. Anything you put in it will leak. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At your fingertips
customer_reviews.text: The spice jars work as expected. They don't seal tight so your spices will age out quicker than in an airtight jar. I love the functionality of the magnetic jars, really more of a tin can.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Organization at Last!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these magnetic spice containers. They are sturdy, spacious, and have a strong magnet firmly attached to the bottom. It is a relief to have readily available and alphabetically arranged containers No more wasting time searching for necessary spices. Love the labels and collapsible funnel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Baby boomer 48

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded hopes
customer_reviews.text: Cooler than expected, like the atypical square shape as well as the built in dispensing options (sprinkle, pour, etc). They are space saving but also near kitchen decor. I have mine on the stove hood, given the refrigerator is full of kid stuff. Look great there, easily accessible for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: cannedstarfish

product_meta.title: Magnetic Spice Jars- Shake or Pour Containers Attach to Most Refrigerator Doors- Set of 24 Dispensers- Easy Open Window Top Shakers
product_meta.description: Size:24 PackMagnetic Spice Tins- Shake or Pour Containers Attach to Most Refrigerator Doors: This set of Magnetic Spice Dispensers allow you to keep your spices close at hand on your refrigerator or appliance doors. The tins feature see through windows with openings to either pour or shake. Tight fit lids will not pop off. They are lightweight, but durable and easy to clean. Each jar measures 2.25" x 2.25" x. 2.5"
feature_bullets: Extra strong magnets allow you to keep your dispensers right at hand
Tight fit lids will not pop off
Mounts easily to most refrigerator and appliance doors
Lightweight but durable and easy to clean
Features see through lid with openings for pouring or shaking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars726 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
